JavaScript中的作用域是依靠函数生成的
* 全局作用域

var i = 100;
    function outer() {
        console.log(i);
        function inner() {
            console.log(i);
            var i  = 1;
            console.log(i);
        }
        inner();
        console.log(i);
    }
    outer();

Hoisting

Hoisting is a term you will not find in the JavaScript docs. Hoisting was thought up as a general way of thinking about how execution context (specifically the creation and execution phases) work in JavaScript. But, hoisting can lead to misunderstandings. For example, hoisting teaches that variable and function declarations are physically moved to the top your coding, but this is not what happens at all. What does happen is the variable and function declarations are put into memory during the compile phase, but stays exactly where you typed it in your coding.

JavaScript only hoists declarations, not initializations. If you are using a variable that is declared and initialized after using it, the value will be undefined. The below two examples demonstrate the same behavior.

var i = 1;
var j = 9;
console.log(i+''+j);

    <input type="text" id="inputNum">
    <button id="left_in">左侧入</button>

    <button id="left_out">左侧出</button>
    <button id="right_out">右侧出</button>

    <button id="randomBtn">生成随机数</button>

</div>
<script>
window.onload = function () {
    document.getElementById('left_in').onclick = leftIn;
    document.getElementById('right_in').onclick = rightIn;
    document.getElementById('left_out').onclick = leftOut;
    document.getElementById('right_out').onclick = rightOut;
    document.getElementById('randomBtn').onclick = randomData;
}
var list = document.getElementById('list');
var numTest = /^\d{2,3}$/;//限制输入的数字在10-100
var innerSpan = list.getElementsByTagName('div');
function leftIn() {
    var num = document.getElementById('inputNum').value;
    var newSpan = document.createElement('div');
    newSpan.style.height = parseInt(num) + 'px';
    if(num > 100||!numTest.test(num)) {
        alert('Number is Wrong');
    }else if (innerSpan.length > 60) {
        alert('队列数量超出60')
    }//队列元素数量最多限制为60个，当超过60个时，添加元素时alert出提示
    else if(!innerSpan[0]) {
        list.appendChild(newSpan);
    } else {
        list.insertBefore(newSpan,innerSpan[0])
    }
}
function rightIn() {
    var num = document.getElementById('inputNum').value;
    var newSpan = document.createElement('div');
    newSpan.style.height = parseInt(num) + 'px';
    if (!numTest.test(num)) {
        alert('Number is Wrong');
    } else {
        list.appendChild(newSpan);
    }   
}
function leftOut() {
    var listSpan = document.getElementsByTagName('div')[0];
    if (!listSpan) {
        alert('No Number');
    } else {
        list.removeChild(list.firstChild);
    }
}
function rightOut() {
    var listSpan = document.getElementsByTagName('div')[0];
    if (!listSpan) {
        alert('No Number');
    } else {
        list.removeChild(list.lastElementChild);
    }   
}

var sortNum = document.getElementById('sort_num');
sortNum.onclick=function(){
    var eleHeight = [];
    for (var item = 0; item < innerSpan.length; item++) {
        eleHeight.push(innerSpan[item].offsetHeight);       
    }//把innerSpan各元素的高度另存一个数组，方便书写

    var i = 0,j = 1,timer = null;
    timer = setInterval(run,3);
    function run() {
        if (i < eleHeight.length) {
            if (j < eleHeight.length) {
                if (eleHeight[i] > eleHeight[j]) {
                    var temp = eleHeight[i];
                    eleHeight[i] = eleHeight[j];
                    eleHeight[j] = temp;
                    innerSpan[i].style.height = eleHeight[i];
                    innerSpan[j].style.height = temp;
                }
                j++;
            } else {
                i++;
                j = i + 1;
            }                       
        } else {
            clearInterval(timer);
            return;
        }
    }//看的前端接班人的算法，尝试过改成for循环但是失败了…… 
}

//随机生成一组数
function randomData() {
    var data = [];
    for (var i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
        var randomNum = Math.floor(Math.random()*100+10);
        data.push(randomNum);
        list.innerHTML += '<div></div>';
        var newSpan = list.getElementsByTagName('div');
        newSpan[i].style.height = parseInt(randomNum) + 'px';
    }
}
